name: Thieve's vault key
description: A key to the Thieves Guild's vault of gold and other treasures.

name: Aidem fake vault key
description: The fake key made by the Aidem thieves to trick Troublemaker.

name: Feygard's might
description: A Feygard general's weapon of choice.

name: Necklace of Feygard's Glory
description: A Feygardian soldier's medal of honor. To possess is to honor the glorious city of Feygard.

name: Defy's ring
description: Defy's Aidem ring.

name: Greedy's ring
description: Greedy's Aidem ring

name: Grabby's ring
description: Grabby's Aidem ring

name: Zachlanny ring
description: Zachlanny's Aidem ring

name: Nixite crystal
description: A remarkable jewel of unparalleled rarity, exudes an enchanting iridescence reminiscent of tranquil waters under a midday sun. Its surface seems to shimmer with an inner light, casting a soothing teal glow that captivates all who behold it. Legends tell of its unique power coveted by wizards and sorcerers.

name: Enchanted evergreen rod
description: A masterfully crafted staff crowned with a luminous green crystal. It channels the essence of nature, allowing its wielder to control the forces of growth and decay.

name: Music box
description: This ornate wooden box is adorned with intricate carvings and when wound, produces a delicate melody only able to be enjoyed by upper class women.

name: Crystal ball
description: A tool for scrying and divination, believed to reveal hidden knowledge.

name: Witch's candle
description: Used for casting spells and creating an eerie atmosphere.

name: Cursed rat fang
description: A tooth from a rabid Nightfur rat. Cursed with rabies which has debilitating effects on the diseased.

name: Garnet stone
description: A precious stone loved by many

name: Titanforge stompers
description: A heavy boot that boasts animposing design forged with ancient craftsmanship, enhancing the wearer's strength and resilience with each resounding step.

name: Cyclopean eye gem
description: Extracted from the Cyclopea creeper species' giant eye, radiating a faint but mysterious energy.

name: Cyclopea root
description: A root from the Cyclopea creeper which when consumed, has been known to provide a modest boost in strength

name: Photosynthetic leaf
description: A leaf that, when held to sunlight, provides a minor regeneration effect.

name: Hexapede crawler slime
description: Provides temporary immunity to Rootsnare, but at a cost.

name: Healthier worm meat
description: A heathier alternative to your average worm meat.

name: Feline milk
description: A unique elixir exuding the essence of mountain flora.
